QuestData.Title: Taking the Death Bloom
QuestData.Description: Your work has born fruit. Inside the nearby cave a powerful saberon shaman is learning to channel the genesaur magic using the Death Bloom we seek. The solution is before us: kill the shaman, take the Death Bloom, return it to Birchus. That should improve the safety of our outpost.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Kill Smokemaster Snarl and take the Death Bloom.
QuestData.LogDescription: Take the Death Bloom from Smokemaster Snarl in Steamscar Rise.
QuestData.CompletionText: Do you have something for me, little beast?
QuestData.RewardText: You have... you have brought me the bloom. At last my purpose can be fulfilled!
